data.name: Hazard Ops: Versus Pack
data.detailed_description:
Brutal carnage and hard-hitting action that will teach even veteran players the meaning of fear: That’s the essence of Hazard Ops. If you want to rock some PvP with a mech, this is the pack for you.

It comes with a face-melting weapon for each hand, one of which is permanent, so there’s no end to the killing pleasure! Tear up the battlefield with a serious assault rifle, a slick-looking sniper, and incendiary Fire Bombs.

The extras included make reloading easier, increase your accuracy, and give you 30 days of VIP access (+30% XP and Coins, VIP store access, and several buffs).

Weapons, Mods & Tech Enhancement

  • Scorching P90 (permanent)
  • Scorching M82 (7 days)
  • Big Time Fire Bomb Box
  • SMG Reflex Scope (7 days)
  • SMG High Capacity Mag (7 days)
  • Auto Mag Loader (14 days)

Mech

  • Crimson Ram (3 days)


Costumes

  • Crimson Ram (3 days)

Consumables

  • 30 days VIP Access
  • 1 day Double XP Boost
  • 1x Key Card
  • 1x Difficulty

So charge into battle, ready your weapon, and fire away!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 7600GT (must support Shader Model 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, Core 2 Quad, i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9800GT, GT240 (4800 series, HD5600 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
